main.name: Biniyam Belayneh
main.title: AI and MLOps Engineer
main.description: Building reliable ML platforms and pipelines on AWS & GCP. Shipping models to production with CI/CD, observability, and measurable impact.

main.highlightSubtitle: 40% cloud cost reduction • 1-week automated releases • +23% CTR via audience modeling • 92% classification accuracy • 3.5% downtime reduction
paragraphs: AI/ML Engineer focused on MLOps: I build reliable, compliant, and cost-efficient ML platforms and pipelines on AWS and GCP using MLflow, Airflow, Docker, Kubernetes/EKS, Spark and Vertex AI. I ship models to production with CI/CD, model registry/versioning, and observability, enabling faster releases and safer rollouts.

I also build end-to-end streaming and batch processing ELT/ETL pipelines working with S3, RDS, Postgres, Kinesis Firehose, DBT, BigQuery, and more. Delivered measurable impact: 40% cloud cost reduction, 1-week automated releases (from 2 weeks), +23% CTR via audience modeling, 92% creative classification accuracy, and 3.5% downtime reduction.

expertise.title: ML Infrastructure
expertise.description: Scalable ML pipelines with end-to-end automation

expertise.title: Cloud Architecture
expertise.description: Secure, cost-effective cloud solutions for ML

main.name: Sarah Johnson
main.title: Senior Data Scientist
main.quote: Working with Biniyam was exceptional. His expertise in MLOps and ability to streamline complex machine learning workflows significantly improved our deployment efficiency. He delivered scalable solutions that exceeded our expectations.

main.name: Michael Chen
main.title: Engineering Manager
main.quote: Biniyam's technical leadership and deep understanding of cloud architecture transformed our ML infrastructure. His attention to detail and commitment to best practices made our collaboration highly successful.

main.name: Dr. Emily Rodriguez
main.title: Head of AI Research
main.quote: Biniyam demonstrated remarkable problem-solving skills and innovative thinking. His ability to bridge the gap between research and production deployment is truly impressive. A valuable team member.

main.name: Alex Thompson
main.title: CTO
main.quote: The ML pipeline architecture that Biniyam designed for us has been running flawlessly for months. His expertise in automation and monitoring saved us countless hours and significantly reduced our operational costs.
